divs: sighting detailsi was a young child at the time i remember this event happening and i think i may have only been about two or three years old ,but i strongly believe this happened and i have reoccuring memories of the day this happaned. i can't give the approximate date nor the time and the best i can guess was it was around the time of 1992 or 1993 in williamstan michigan that this happened as i remenber that i was able to talk. so here's my best description of what happened to me . i myself was only i guess three years old and being young i was asleep and i was woken up remember hearing police sirens at about 9:30 am in the morning and my mom or someone else came into the room kinda in a panic saying justin, justin wake up! i was woken up by this person who obviously was my mom and i was carried outside to where several people were outside with their attention fixed up into the sky. i looked up and noticed that further up the road from my house a fairly big sized object was hovering over the road and there ware paramedics who were pulled over and everyone who was around where this object was was terrified of it pointing toward the sky . the craft from my reoccuring memories that i saw that day was was fairly big and it was the shape of a disc .the sides of it had lined lights on it and on the bottom there was a hole where there was some kind of propulsion system that admitted a sky blue \neon flame. going up from the sides of the craft it was like a edged lid shape cocering the bottom up and was pure black. so my reaction i guess at my age to this object were like mommy what is that ,and i guess she was scared or something as i never remember her giving me a answer but i was set down and my mom walked across the street and this is what i can best remember.
Summary: Large disk shaped flying craft with spinning lights .
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Williamston
There were no other sightings in Williamston on or around June 1st 1992
